text: ولقد خلقنا الانسن من سللة من طين

translations.translation: We created man from the purest kind of clay;
We created man from the finest extract of clay,
We created man out of the extract of clay,
We have created the human being from an extract of clay
Indeed We created man from a chosen soil.
And indeed We created man out of an extract of Tin.
And certainly We created man of an extract of clay,
We created man of an extraction of clay,
Verily We created man from a product of wet earth;
We created man from an essence of clay,
And assuredly We created man of an extract of clay.
Certainly We created man from an extract of clay.
Man We did create from a quintessence (of clay);
And indeed We created man (Adam) out of an extract of clay (water and earth).
We created the human from an essence of clay:
We created man from an extract of clay.
And certainly did We create man from an extract of clay.

[23:12] And, by God, We certainly created man, Adam, from an extraction (min sulālatin, derives from [the verbal expression] salaltu’l-shay’a mina’l-shay’, ‘I drew one thing out of another’, meaning, ‘I extracted it therefrom’) his [Adam’s] substance being, of clay (min tīnin is semantically connected to sulālatin, ‘an extraction’).
(Verily We created man) the son of Adam (from a product of wet earth);

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { مِن سُلاَلَةٍ } معناه صَفوةُ المَاءِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } كيف لا يرثون الفردوس ولا يخلدون فيها مع أنهم جبلوا لأجلها، سيما إذا كملوا سلوكهم وتمموا نسكها على الوجه الذي هداهم الأنبياء والرسل والأولياء الراشدون الذين هم خلفاء عن الرسل الكرام والأنبياء العظام - عليهم التحية والسلام - إذ { وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلإِنْسَانَ } أي: أظهرنا وقدّرنا جسم آدم وبنيه أولاً { مِن سُلاَلَةٍ } أي: ربدة وخلاصة منتخبة { مِّن طِينٍ } [المؤمنون: 12] الذي هو مادة جميع الأجسام السفلية وأقوى عناصرها وهيولاها
